description: This table contains the Postop Skin information for the Surgical Log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: POSTOP_SKIN_SITE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The post-op skin site.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: POSTOP_SKIN_LAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the laterality of a post-op skin site.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Left


Right


Bilateral


N/A


Default
